content: Hey @WG-async-foundations -- sorry for running a bit late.
@tmandry can't make it today
I guess I would say let's open with a bit of time for announcements
• I wanted to give a shout out to @Carl Lerche's "shiny future" blog post #wg-async-foundations > a-shiny-future
not sure if anybody else has anything to note -- or is here? :) wave at least if you're arond
• I've been working on an "experience focused" story I call the Async Party Time.
It's got fresh text but still needs work

My main plans personally are to focus on that and maybe sketch out a few different variations; the idea is to be able to ask ourselves how well they satisfy the experiences described in the Async Party Time. I quite enjoyed Carl's post, which hits on one of the "design space corners" that I think could work really well.
